name: Powerstones
overview: A clone of Vital Light by Harald Müller (Muller) released in 1994. It was part of the Gamers' Delight and Gamers' Delight 2 compilations. You have 5 colors on your palette, use those colors to make the falling blocks all the same color, which will remove them from the sky. Each level brings more complex mixes and faster falling stones.
